| 'Raw' (2010) Next album = [[Knock Madness]] (2013)
}} 'Raw' is the second studio album released by the rapper Hopsin. It was put on
iTunes on November 19, 2010. It was released on Funk Volume, and the first on
Funk Volume. On the song 'Sag My Pants' Hopsin disses mainstream rappers Drake,
Soulja Boy, Lil Wayne, and Lupe Fiasco. He also disses the widowed wife of Eazy-
E, Tomica Wright, vowing that he'll 'make sure no one signs with Ruthless
Records again. Despite the release of the previous album, [[Gazing at the
Moonlight]], Hopsin considers Raw as his debut album. As of December 2012, it
has sold approximately 15,000 copies in the US. www.ukmix.org/forums/viewto-
pic.php?t=56627&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=1225&sid=d80cc66f56371986f90c33c-
ba6216327
